Bernie Sanders says he counts Harry Reid among his allies in this fight: The battle lines are forming within the Democratic Party over the charged question of reforming Social Security in the days leading up to Barack Obama 's State of the Union address. SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as`` shyster loans.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate.'' Shyster is a derogatory term used to describe an unprincipled lawyer or politician. He used the term at least

And Mr. Simon Cowell made little secret that he was bored and ready to get on to his next series, The X Factor,`` already a hit in Britain and scheduled to launch stateside this fall. Ellen DeGeneres , Ms. Paula Abdul 's replacement, never jelled with the other judges, including singer Kara DioGuardi , who had been brought on for the 2009 season to bolster the show in advance of Ms. Paula Abdul 's expected departure. Now Ms. Ellen DeGeneres and Ms. Kara DioGuardi are both gone. The saga of the`` American Idol phenomenon, from its origins in the 2001 hit British series`` Pop Idol'' right up to Mr. Simon Cowell 's departure, is the focus of Richard Rushfield's breezy, gossipy`` American Idol: The Untold Story

Raila Odinga said Gbagbo broke several promises he had made to lift a blockade put in place around the Abidjan hotel where Alassane Ouattara is confined. Mr. Gbagbo gave me an assurance that this blockade would be lifted yesterday, but he broke that promise- for the second time in two weeks, Raila Odinga said. In his meetings with Alassane Ouattara , he said, the former economist agreed to give Gbagbo's allies a certain number of ministry positions in a new government. executive chairman,`` a lot of my time'' will be devoted to dealing with regulators and other government officials, Eric Schmidt said.`` We've got very complicated government issues,'' he said, adding that we move quickly, and we tend to be disruptive at scale. European Union officials opened a formal antitrust probe last year into Google search results, while in China the company opted to shut down its mainland search engine rather than censor results for user queries.
